summary: Diff implements some of the requested visual updates in ApaAggregateCharts.tsx (PPI line stroke/strokeWidth and connectNulls shown), but the diff is truncated before showing the remaining <Line /> components, so full compliance with REQ-250/REQ-251 cannot be verified. The change set also violates the BuildRequest constraint to modify only ApaAggregateCharts.tsx and introduces unrequested dot-shape customization.

missing_requirements.requirement: Match Results chart lines must use exact strokes: Your Points #000, Opponent Points #2563eb, Defensive Shots #7c3aed; all with strokeWidth={2}.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff snippet only shows the PPI & aPPI Trend portion and is truncated before the Match Results chart <Line /> definitions, so these required stroke/strokeWidth settings are not evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Set connectNulls={true} on every Recharts <Line /> used in both charts (all five lines).
missing_requirements.reason: Only the PPI line explicitly shows connectNulls={true} in the provided snippet; the remaining lines are not visible due to truncation, so inclusion on all five lines is not evidenced.

hallucinated_features.description: Custom dot shapes (CircleDot/SquareDot/TriangleDot) and assigning dot props to lines.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists changing dot shapes/colors as a non-goal and only requests stroke color/width and connectNulls changes.
